title: Justice: Night Horses MC
description: My father wasn't mean enough to make me run or back down, but when I piss off a biker named Snake, I know I've gotta get out of town. The best thing I can do is avoid any trouble - but trouble keeps finding me.My beautiful redhead walked into my life and turned it upside down. Only trouble is, a pimp is after her, to twist her and use her and spit her out. I've been in the Night Horses for a while - can Merle help me keep my girl safe?This is a stand-alone Night Horses MC novella.
author: Sarah Sorana
